name: Emoji Nails Designer-Special Polish
description:
Emoji Nails Designer is a fashion nail polish game.
Princess was looking for a fun nail art design. Emoji nail art design would be the right fit for her. She is going to a nail salon where all the manicurists use nail design techniques that would produce a great result and impresses the clients. The manicurists at the nail salon enjoy teaching the girls how to design their own incredible nail art and they also give them lot of fashion ideas. Do you want to learn how to properly manicure your nails at your home without messing up? Play this fun online girl game.

Game Features:
- Do you want to get remarkable nails?Let's have a trip for the nail salon
- Nail salon,painting your dream colorful nail style
- Kinds of gorgeous nail color and decorations as your choice
- Fashion is often inspired from the things we love the most
- Exquisite and fluent frames,vivid images
